name: Transformers - Rendering
body:
Work Done

* Implemented 3D motion of vehicle in x, y, z
* Implemented changing yaw, pitch, roll of vehicle
* Designed cubical environment with textures
* Lighting effect on textures working
* Billboard with cloud textures 
* Three camera views accessible with 1,2,3 number keys

***
![http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JOqxgp-ZWe0/U3BtyEQlEiI/AAAAAAAAOfg/Doq6Q2MwIKA/s1600/google-logo-874x288.png](Image sample)

***

Authors:

* [Ashwin Kachhara | 10D070048](https://github.com/ashwinkachhara)
* [Sumeet Fefar | 10D070001](https://github.com/sumeetfefar)

***
Credits: 
[Load Textures code by ankit-maverick](https://github.com/ankit-maverick/computergraphics/blob/master/musicbox/loadTexture.cpp)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
